title: Crave
description: When passion sets your soul on fire.  Object of a deadly obsession, Felicity has been taken by the crazed incubus, Marius. Secrets, lies, and betrayals are mounting against Alex and Felicity. Will their passion and love be enough to keep from breaking Felicity, or will Alexâ€™s world be the end of her?
author: Felicia Fox
